thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 24 of 511
thread.title: Annalyssa Vanderwerf

author: Annalyssa Vanderwerf
title: Annalyssa Vanderwerf
text: The website is simple to maneuver through, all options are bright and clear so i have a good idea of what my options will look like on me before I buy, I just didn't like that the only way to get the 2 for $24 discount is by signing on to a commitment and having to skip the month in order to avoid the $49.95 charge- because, what if you forget you know? I liked the idea of having clothes sent every month but would have preferred to have the option if I wanted that commitment or not and still be able to get the 'your first two pants 2 for $24' just by becoming a member- I feel as though, if a company is confident in their product, that the consumer will be back to pay more for future products. I do like the options, the size and measurement options and the different patterns and styles to choose from. Fun, simple website and I felt confident in my purchases. Thank you!
